summary: A remote denial of service vulnerability exists in Samba's DCE/RPC server when processing NDR-encoded data.
details: A remote denial of service vulnerability exists in Samba's DCE/RPC server when processing NDR-encoded data.

summary: A symbolic link race condition in Samba's smbd allows a user to access files or directories outside of the configured share path.
details: A symbolic link race condition in Samba's smbd allows a user to access files or directories outside of the configured share path.

summary: A vulnerability in the Samba kpasswd service could allow an attacker to cause a denial of service or potentially execute code.
details: A vulnerability in the Samba kpasswd service could allow an attacker to cause a denial of service or potentially execute code.

summary: A denial of service vulnerability exists in the Samba DCE/RPC server due to excessive memory allocation when handling certain requests.
details: A denial of service vulnerability exists in the Samba DCE/RPC server due to excessive memory allocation when handling certain requests.

summary: The Samba SMB client could send uninitialized data from the heap when connecting to a malicious server, potentially leaking sensitive information.
details: The Samba SMB client could send uninitialized data from the heap when connecting to a malicious server, potentially leaking sensitive information.
